item.title: Basic Econometrics by Gujarati and Porter
item.description: Overview This book is the tipical book reference for a given subject, and when the theme is Econometrics, this material is highly recommended for economics grad students. For its importance, in this post I’ll present a brief summary of each chapter and solve some exercises (because the book doesn’t present the answer for the problems). Also, I’ll release the datasets used on the problems on my github account. The authors aimed to build a material that would serve all levels of students that want learn econometrics.
